plugins.name: feature-plan
plugins.description: Plan-only feature development: explore codebase, clarify requirements, design architecture, write plan document. Stops before implementation.

plugins.name: feature-review
plugins.description: Review implemented features against their plan documents. Parallel reviewers check simplicity, correctness, and conventions.

plugins.name: modularize
plugins.description: Extract modules from monolithic files using multi-agent cohesion and coupling analysis. Identifies candidates, maps dependencies, designs interfaces, and performs extraction with user approval.

plugins.name: sync-architecture
plugins.description: Regenerate architecture documentation from current code state. Scans source for APIs and types, compares to existing docs, applies minimal patches.
